title: What are some must have apps for new player?

comments.author: Teranas.6150
comments.body:
After launching Overwolf you can open the Overwolf Store (the box icon containing various other icons). On the left is a category named “GW2 App challenge”. This category contains the submissions for the latest challenge.

You can also list ALL applications made for Guild Wars 2 by clicking on the “For games” category and “View all” next to the headline “Apps for Guild Wars 2”.

comments.author: Hehemeat.7024
comments.body: I am not new to GW2, however i am new to the overlays/API aspect. where is a list for the overwolf submissions?

comments.author: Zohan.1238
comments.body: hello all, im new to the game and still learning and was wondering what are some must have apps to help aid someone in the game? i have tried gw2hud bit it doesnt seem to load for me on my android phone, i followed the instructions but just goes in a infinite load loop, so what are some other apps or websites that will help? like to follow events, not just boss events but map events
